channel.title: Naples on Francesco Farina
channel.description: Recent content in Naples on Francesco Farina

item.title: A tour of Naples
item.description: Map of Naples Points of interests Piazza del Plebiscito, Lungomare and Castles Piazza Plebiscito Gran Caffè Gambrinus Lungomare Caracciolo Castel dell’Ovo Open to the public Castel Nuovo (a.k.a. Maschio Angioino, open to the public) High Street Via Toledo (high street, shopping) Galleria Umberto I Monumental complex of S. Claire (1310) Monastero di Santa Chiara https://www.monasterodisantachiara.it/english/ Piazza del Gesù Nuovo Spaccanapoli and Cathedrals Spaccanapoli (a.k.a. San Biagio dei librai) Via dei Tribunali parallel to Spaccanapoli the most characteristic street heart of the city, inside the ancient walls Santa Maria Assunta Cathedral (Dome) Food Naples is the paradise of delicious and cheap street food.
